data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The highly-profiled case ended in a mistrial. The ____ could ____ reach a consensus ____ several ____ of ____. Because ____ the jury's deadlock, the ____ had ____ call ____ a ____ trial. The whole case will be re-litigated in the fall.
data.partBlankContent: The highly-profiled case ended in a mistrial. The ju__ could n__ reach a consensus af___ several da__ of delibe_______. Because o_ the jury's deadlock, the ju___ had t_ call f__ a n__ trial. The whole case will be re-litigated in the fall.
data.fullContent: The highly-profiled case ended in a mistrial. The jury could not reach a consensus after several days of deliberations. Because of the jury's deadlock, the judge had to call for a new trial. The whole case will be re-litigated in the fall.
data.answer: 这个备受瞩目的案件以审判无效告终。经过几天的审议，陪审团未能达成一致意见。由于陪审团陷入僵局，法官不得不要求重新审理。整个案件将在今年秋天重新提起诉讼。
